home.title: I'm Iv√°n Olivares ‚Äî a senior software engineer, vinyl enthusiast, and dog dad.
home.articleTitle: Building my v2025 website with V0: Thoughts on using AI for prototyping and shipping
home.currentWork: I'm currently working as a Tech Director at {glb}, based in Santiago, Chile. I also enjoy sharing my knowledge and insights with the community through articles and
home.background: I started in the development world in 2004, experimenting with computers (often breaking things) and learning to program by researching online. At just 15, I built my first website ‚Äî and never stopped. In 2010, I launched my first entrepreneurial venture with my first clients, and fell even more in love with technology.
home.mission: My personal mission is to push the world forward by building bridges between people and technology.

talks.pageSubtitle: Conferences, Podcasts, Streams, Meetups and more.

giving-talks.backToTalks: Back to talks I have given
giving-talks.title: Are you looking for Speaker for your talk?
giving-talks.description: Hey! My name is {name}. Passionate developer living in Santiago, Chile. I am focusing on different areas of technology but I love Media & Streaming Industry from tech side I love to work with technologies from the JS Ecosystem like React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.JS, among others.
giving-talks.breakNotice: I am currently taking a break on giving talks.
giving-talks.informationDescription: You can use the following information to present me:
giving-talks.introduction: A passionate software engineer and entrepreneur. Currently working as Tech Director for Globant in the Media & Entertainment AI Studio. Loves to build using the latest technologies. Mainly focused in the JS Ecosystem.

footer.contactText: If you'd like to chat about building products, development, consulting, or software design, get in touch at {email} or reach out to me on Twitter
footer.creativeCommons: Where no copyright is indicated, the contents are available under {license}

connect.title: Let's Connect
connect.description: Always interested in new opportunities, collaborations, and conversations about technology and software design.

uses.title: My tools, gear and apps.

uses.description2: If you want to know more about my experience with some specific gadget, just tweet me:
